comments:
build 09-20 on Win2K
running j9

I don't know how I got into this state, but I've had this workspace around a 
while and upgraded a couple of builds on it. Also, I've switched between IBM 
JRE and J9 a couple of times. 

Now whenever I try and open the launch configurations, nothing happens. I will 
attach my .log file which shows some NullPointerExceptions.

Note that I just created a new launch config for a runtime workbench (Run 
as... -> Runtime Workbench) and after that I could open the launch config page 
ok. 

Also note that my new runtime workbench config was in the list but not my 
previous one. (it might have been named the same and been over-written...I'm 
not sure?)

It looks like the default JRE went missing. We were not accounting for 
JavaRuntime.getDefaultVMInstall() to return null, which is valid. I fixed the 
problem in the JRE tab, and now have a problem in the classpath tab:
